itunes:title: your juiciest gym stories // naughty or nice
title: your juiciest gym stories // naughty or nice
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
itunes:summary:
In the words of everyone's favorite guest, this episode is going to be like unwrapping a Christmas present! Tune in, as britt & darian read & rate your JUICIEST gym stories as naughty or nice!

Timestamps:

1:10 weekly recap
2:30 snack plate
3:05 happy holidays
3:55 bosu ball besties 
5:05 box jump bum cheeks
7:50 funny, sweet old men
8:50 torn leggings
10:00 darian's (s)naughty 5th grade story
11:00 britt's water fiasco
13:18 taking the high road
16:00 home gym sin
17:20 seeing ear dog
18:40 get out of town dave patrick
22:00 creepy, naughty bob
25:30 treadmill tea
28:10 an abrupt correction
29:40 unnecessary, sweaty comment
31:18 A WORD ON GYM SAFETY
35:44 ouch!
39:30 gym bro comment
40:50 puddle shame
42:40 he pounced
46:20 a DM love story
47:20 plate drop injury
49:20 woman power
49:50 the mysterious gym king
52:10 cable machine tantrum
54:30 fart rocket fall
55:20 string check
56:10 smoke show creeper
58:19 EXCUSE ME!?
59:45 jumping jack squeaker
1:02:25 calf raise confusion
1:03:56 the nicest story
1:07:05 what d & b have learned
1:07:45 holiday wishes
1:08:10 what are you going to do (GUILT FREE) during the holidays?
